A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Complete garbage. Force Awakens was good\, not great by any means but it felt like old school Star Wars. Last Jedi ruined Luke's character and had far too many prequel type comedy moments. The opening scene with Luke throwing he saber over his shoulder and then milking a walrus type creature set the tone for a terrible movie. The plot is a rebel ship is running out of gas but the New Order can't catch up to them. Lol. It's pathetic. Terrible characters too with no chemistry too. Unreal
